Title: Lavrov Says Russia Ready to Defend Itself Through ‘Any Means’
Description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov on Thursday said he hoped Ukraine's allies took 'seriously' Moscow's recent use of a hypersonic missile in the conflict there, and warned that Russia was ready to use 'any means' to defend itself.
